name: Girls Soccer 2015: Ultimate soccer coach for football star player and soccer fans skills
name_original: Girls Soccer 2015: Ultimate soccer coach for football star player and soccer fans skills
description:
***Game Contains High Resolution graphics material and effects, If you have iPhone 4 or iPad 1 you may experience some glitches or jerky animations***

Get ready for Girls Street Soccer fun. Its first game on Appstore of its kind. Game contains high quality music and graphics. Enjoy the most realistic girls soccer game.

=======
Controls
=======
-Smart joystick control can be used to move player
-Sprint control to boost up running speed
-Quick Snatch to snatch ball from opponent
-Pass control to pass the ball to friendly player
-Kick control to make a powerful kick
-Tackle control to snatch ball from opponent player when its near


===========
Game Modes
===========
-There are total 2 Game Modes and 10 teams from world's top chart.
-Quick Match: It sets the match with a random team.
-Tournament: Play tournament, win matches and qualify to final


==========
Social Features
==========
-Share your score with friends on Facebook
-Shout on social media when you manage to beat your opponent team in match
-Invite friends to play game
-Make your place in global leader board and compete players from all over the world


=======
Feedback
=======
If you have any suggested features or improvements please leave a comment, or send us an email at techmowo@gmail.com. In case something is not working correctly please let us know, I'll be glad to fix that.
Please post comments and feedback. When posting low rating please describe what is wrong to give the possibility to fix that issue.
